attributes.action: Raise the National Speed Limit from 70mph to 80mph.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The national speed limit was introduced several decades ago. It was fit for its time, when cars were slower and a lot less safer. Seat belts were not even required.

Every day on the motorway more cars than not are driving at a speed above the National Speed Limit. 

I believe that if we were to raise the speed limit by 10 miles per hour to 80mph, and be far more strict on drivers breaking this limit we would be more comfortable when driving on the road, which will lead to less accidents.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Raise the National Speed Limit from 70mph to 80mph."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20197


Prime Minister's Office
